title: Svelte
desc: Svelte is a radical new approach to building user interfaces. Whereas traditional frameworks like React and Vue do the bulk of their work in the browser, Svelte shifts that work into a compile step that happens when you build your app.

title: NodeJS
desc: JavaScript runtime that lets you build fast and scalable server-side applications. Think lightweight code and asynchronous magic.

title: ExpressJS
desc: Powerful web framework for NodeJS, making it easy to create APIs and web apps with routing, middleware, and more. Think streamlined organization for your server logic.

title: MongoDB
desc: NoSQL database that stores data in flexible documents, perfect for dynamic applications. Think easy data storage and retrieval without rigid relational tables.
